author: djencks
msg: More duplicate plan removal and plan cleanup

author: rjung
msg: We created a new server config structure, but we didn't use it :(

author: jmsnell
msg: When writing out large Atom documents, going through an creating a bunch of objects is less than
optimum.  The new StreamWriter interface allows us to write out Atom documents using a streaming
interface.  This is a work in progress.  There are some features, such as xml:lang and xml:base that need better support.

author: rjung
msg: Complete allowing mount patterns beginning with "*"

author: dandiep
msg: More CollectionProvider cleanups. Start of JCR media entry support. More tests are coming.
